float* CPCA::Proyectar ( IplImage *  I,
int  ncomps = -1 
) [inline]

Projects an image into given PCA space.

Projects input image to PCA space. The input image format must be IPL_DEPTH_32F, if it is not provided in that format it will be temporary converted. Returns coefficients corresponding to the projection in this space

Parameters:
I Input image to be projected
ncomps Components used for projected representation

IplImage* CPCA::Reconstruir ( float *  Ip,
int  ncomps = -1 
) [inline]

Reconstructs a projection.

Reconstructs an image given its PCA representation, i.e. its coefficients. The output image format will be IPL_DEPTH_32F.

Parameters:
Ip Input image to be projected
ncomps Components used for projected representation

double CPCA::GetPCAReconstructionError ( IplImage *  imgIN  )  [inline]

Computes PCA reconstruction error.

Computes the PCA reconstruction error of image imgIN

Parameters:
imgIN Input image to be projected and reconstructed

void CPCA::IncrementalPCA ( IplImage *  NewImage,
int  ncomps = -1 
) [inline]

Modifies PCA space incrementally with a new observation.

Computes the PCA reconstruction error of image imgIN. The reference used was "Incremental PCA for On-line Visual Learning and Recognition"

Parameters:
NewImage New observation to be considered
ncomps Number of components to be used for reconstruction, if none is indicated the number available will be used
